description: Born in the Cayman Islands, Maverick has the laid back sexuality men from the Caribbean are rumored to have cornered the market on.  Here's a guy that will find something to love in almost any women and he offers them plenty of reasons for them to love him back.From the size of the mound in his pants even as he walked in the door, seemed like he wasn't exaggerating when he described his equipment on the phone.When he started talking about the kind of women he likes, his hands automatically went into his pants, rubbing and massaging until it looked like those shorts were going to burst at the seams. Hot as it was when he finally hauls out that almost nine inch chocolate bar, seeing that dark smooth skin covered in ropes of pearly white spermis what really satisfied our sweet tooth!
title: Black Beauty, Scene #02
